participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and enthusiastic, Emily has a playful spirit and a love for education.
participant_1.background: I wash my clothes weekly. Pink is my favorite color. I have a cat named Leela. I got off the road when I married my sweetheart. My favorite show is Tom and Jerry.

participant_2.name: David
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and determined, David enjoys both physical activity and nurturing beauty in his surroundings.
participant_2.background: I enjoy the taste of meat, but my gardens are filled with flowers for others to enjoy. I drive an SUV. Through them I've learned to make up myself and others. I run track for myself. My favorite color is grey.

content.text: Hi! How are you doing this evening?
Pretty good! Just got back from a run. How are you?
I'm doing well! Just got home from work.
I do! I'm a teacher, and I love working with kids.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to be a teacher, but I'm not sure if I'm brave enough to do it.
It can be challenging, but it's so rewarding!
Oh, that's great! I love little kids!
Me too! They're so funny and sweet.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to watch TV, read, and spend time with my family.
That sounds fun! I like to run, go to the gym, and spend time with my family as well.
Nice! We should go on a run together sometime.
That would be fun! I'm free on Saturday if you are.
I am! I'll text you my number.
